import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update organization invite link"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/api/organizations/{organizationId}/invites/{inviteId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update an existing invite link (e.g., disable it). Only organization admins can update invite links.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"organizationId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Organization ID"},{"in":"path","name":"inviteId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Invite ID"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"disabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to disable the invite"},"note":{"type":"string","description":"Updated note for the invite"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Invite link updated successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string","example":"Invite link updated successfully"}}}}}},"400":{"description":"Invalid input data","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string","description":"Error message"},"code":{"type":"string","description":"Error code"},"details":{"type":"object","description":"Additional error details"}},"title":"Error"}}}},"401":{"description":"Not authenticated","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string","description":"Error message"},"code":{"type":"string","description":"Error code"},"details":{"type":"object","description":"Additional error details"}},"title":"Error"}}}},"403":{"description":"Insufficient permissions","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string","description":"Error message"},"code":{"type":"string","description":"Error code"},"details":{"type":"object","description":"Additional error details"}},"title":"Error"}}}},"404":{"description":"Organization or invite not found","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string","description":"Error message"},"code":{"type":"string","description":"Error code"},"details":{"type":"object","description":"Additional error details"}},"title":"Error"}}}},"500":{"description":"Internal server error","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string","description":"Error message"},"code":{"type":"string","description":"Error code"},"details":{"type":"object","description":"Additional error details"}},"title":"Error"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
